DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety 5 week double-blind treatment period VEC-162 compare placebo male female patient primary insomnia .
DOC.brief_title: VEC-162 Study Adult Patients With Primary Insomnia
DOC.criteria: Males female diagnosis primary insomnia define DSMIV . Habitual bedtime 9:00 pm 1:00 . No history evidence restless leg syndrome periodic limb movement disorder sleep apnea . Patients must sign write consent form . History drug alcohol abuse define DSMIV . History psychiatric disorder , include Major Depressive Disorder , Generalized Anxiety Disorder delirium . History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , seizures , sleep apnea , narcolepsy , circadianrhythm sleep disorder , parasomnia sleep disorder chronic insomnia . Recent history shift work jet lag .
